Template.SubjectPart: Your trial period at ScanMeFindMe has ended
Template.HtmlPart:
Hello {{name}},

Yor trial period on ScanMeFindMe has now ended. You can still log in and upgrade to a plan, or otherwise your account and all your QR codes will be deleted after 30 days.
